en.title: **Director - AI Product Development and Management**
en.text:
• Built and scaled a transformative Global Capability Center (GCC), delivering $50M+ business value - 6 Enterprise and 4 Start-up products through AI-enabled Agile Product Development and Cloud Innovation.
  • Developed the world’s largest AI-powered Sustainability Consortium SaaS B2B product, managing $10M+ YoY capital investment over 3 consecutive years evolving into a thriving Startup.
  • Enabled a strategic shift that saved $4M by instilling a fail-fast, fail-cheap innovation culture.
  • Pioneered a $5M mobile AI platform for crop diagnostics using computer vision to predict leaf decay and recommend treatments.
  • Architected AI-Agent, a ChatGPT-4 powered autonomous assistant in MIApp, reducing triage by 50% and accelerating incident resolution by 35%.
  • Spearheaded GenAI-driven sustainability SaaS products with RAG diagnostics adopted by 40+ Fortune 100 firms.
  • Scaled engineering by 900%, shifting from vendor-based to in-house delivery—saving $10M annually and boosting product velocity by 20%.

en.title: **Sr. Technical Program Manager**
en.text:
• Delivered AI-driven energy analytics platform (Scipher) integrated with IoT systems, improving uptime by 30%.
  • Established Agile Release Trains for 96+ cross-functional team members across DevOps and support teams.
  • Engaged MSP-aligned teams to streamline wind farm support, scaling field ops efficiency by over 20%.

en.title: **Engineering Manager**
en.text:
• Built and launched traceability platforms (LitTRACE, SigTRACE, PvTRACE, ASRTRACE, eCTD) with LAMP stack, reducing maintenance by 50%.
  • Developed GTM strategy with marketing, enhancing brand visibility and user adoption.
  • Collaborated with product and design to refine specs, improving user experience and platform efficiency.

en.title: **Technical Product Manager**
en.text:
• Launched a telecom self-service portal, cutting support tickets by 30% and improving user satisfaction.
  • Led CRM and billing system API integrations for real-time sync and reduced operational errors.
  • Implemented A/B testing and UX feedback loops to optimize engagement and retention.
  • Proactively resolved technical issues using analytics dashboards and post-launch monitoring.

en.title: **Software Engineer / Team Lead**
en.text:
• Served across roles from developer to team lead—spanning design, coding, QA, and delivery functions.
  • Built foundational expertise in product delivery lifecycle across diverse enterprise systems and technologies.
